abstract: Obama administration announces that it will review claims made by Delta Air Lines, United Airlines and American Airlines that Emirates, Etihad Airways and Qatar Airways received more than $42 billion in aid from their governments, thereby distorting market.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration said it would review claims that Emirates, Etihad Airways and Qatar Airways received large subsidies from their governments that distorted the global aviation market.

headline.main: U.S. to Review Complaint About Gulf Air Carriers
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Review Complaint About Gulf Air Carriers

snippet: The Obama administration said it would review claims that Emirates, Etihad Airways and Qatar Airways received large subsidies from their governments that distorted the global aviation market.
